seo.metaTitle: Physio Chronicles Podcast | Evidence-Based Physiotherapy Discussions
seo.metaDescription: Join Swatheeshwaran and Dr. Swathi as they discuss evidence-based physiotherapy, clinical reasoning, and rehabilitation strategies. Watch our podcast series on YouTube.
seo.ogTitle: Physio Chronicles - Your Guide to Evidence-Based Physiotherapy
seo.ogDescription: Deep dives into clinical reasoning, research updates, and practical rehabilitation strategies.

hero.title: Physio Chronicles
hero.subtitle: Join us on a journey through evidence-based physiotherapy. Real conversations, practical insights, and clinical wisdom.

description: Physio Chronicles is your go-to podcast for evidence-based physiotherapy discussions. Each episode features in-depth conversations about clinical reasoning, research updates, and practical rehabilitation strategies that you can apply in your practice.

episodes.title: Understanding Tendonopathy: Beyond the Basics
episodes.description: A comprehensive discussion on tendon pain management, loading principles, and the latest evidence on rehabilitation protocols. We explore isometric vs eccentric loading and when to use each approach.

episodes.title: Clinical Reasoning in Complex Cases
episodes.description: Exploring how to think through complex patient presentations, manage uncertainty, and apply biopsychosocial principles in real-world practice.

episodes.title: Plantar Heel Pain: The Complete Picture
episodes.description: Deep dive into plantar fasciitis and heel pain. We discuss assessment, treatment options, and the role of the kinetic chain in heel pain presentations.
highlights: Role of hip and ankle mobility

episodes.title: Pain Science for Physiotherapists
episodes.description: Making sense of pain neuroscience and how to effectively communicate complex pain concepts to patients in a way that empowers them.

episodes.title: Shoulder Rehabilitation: Evidence Update
episodes.description: Latest evidence on shoulder pain management, rotator cuff rehabilitation, and exercise prescription for common shoulder conditions.

episodes.title: ACL Rehabilitation Protocols
episodes.description: Evidence-based ACL reconstruction rehabilitation, return to sport testing, and psychological readiness for athletes recovering from ACL injuries.

cta.title: Never Miss an Episode
cta.description: Subscribe to our YouTube channel for weekly episodes on evidence-based physiotherapy.
